svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0" version="28.2.7"> <diagram name="Failure Mode Anatomy" id="failure-anatomy"> <mxGraphModel dx="1383" dy="703" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1400" pageHeight="800" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="title" value="Failure Mode Anatomy: How RAG Breaks Down" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#111827;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="20" width="600" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="process-bg" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F9FAFB;strokeColor=#E5E7EB;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="70" width="1300" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="process-title" value="The Basic RAG Process" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#111827;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="80" width="200" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="step1" value="User Query" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#DBEAFE;strokeColor=#2563EB;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563EB;fontStyle=1" parent="1" source="step1" target="step2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="200" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="250" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="step2" value="Embed Query" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#DBEAFE;strokeColor=#2563EB;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="316" y="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563EB;fontStyle=1" parent="1" source="step2" target="step3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="350" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="400" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="step3" value="Vector Search" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#DBEAFE;strokeColor=#2563EB;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="574" y="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563EB;fontStyle=1" parent="1" source="step3" target="step4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="500" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="550" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="step4" value="Rank by Cosine Similarity" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#DBEAFE;strokeColor=#2563EB;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="854" y="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563EB;fontStyle=1" parent="1" source="step4" target="step5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="700" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="step5" value="Generate Answer" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#DBEAFE;strokeColor=#2563EB;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=11;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1119" y="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="failure-indicator" value="Three Failure Points" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fillColor=#FEF3C7;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#92400E;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="544" y="195" width="180" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-bg" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E7EB;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="240" width="380" height="520" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-title" value="Failure Mode 1: Semantic Drift" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FEE2E2;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=13;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#991B1B;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="255" width="340" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-step1" value="Step 1: Query with multiple constraints (Attribute A + Attribute B + Attribute C)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="300" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-step2" value="Step 2: Embedding captures weights [Attr B: 0.8, Attr C: 0.9, Attr A: 0.6]" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="355" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-step3" value="Step 3: Vector DB matches on higher weighted attributes (B and C) ignoring lower weight (A)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="415" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-step4" value="Step 4: Returns result with high semantic similarity based on partial match" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="475" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-step5" value="Step 5: FAILURE - Critical constraint (Attribute A) was ignored" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEE2E2;strokeColor=#EF4444;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="535" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-solution" value="Solution: Use BM25 for exact keyword matching on critical attributes" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D1FAE5;strokeColor=#10B981;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#065F46;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="595" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-arrow1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="355" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-arrow2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="415" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-arrow3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="460" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="475" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-arrow4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#EF4444;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="520" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="535" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub1-arrow5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#10B981;dashed=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="580" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="595" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-bg" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E7EB;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="240" width="380" height="520" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-title" value="Failure Mode 2: Broken Context" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FEE2E2;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=13;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#991B1B;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="255" width="340" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-step1" value="Step 1: Original document contains Entity X in context. Later mentions pronoun or reference to X" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="300" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-step2" value="Step 2: Chunking separates entity definition (Chunk N) from reference (Chunk M)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="360" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-step3" value="Step 3: Query asks about the referenced entity" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="420" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-step4" value="Step 4: Retrieves Chunk M in isolation without entity definition from Chunk N" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="475" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-step5" value="Step 5: FAILURE - Entity reference lacks context, answer incomplete or wrong" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEE2E2;strokeColor=#EF4444;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="535" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-solution" value="Solution: Contextual Retrieval or Late Chunking to preserve references" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D1FAE5;strokeColor=#10B981;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#065F46;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="595" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-arrow1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="345" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="360" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-arrow2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="405" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="420" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-arrow3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="460" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="475" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-arrow4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#EF4444;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="520" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="535" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub2-arrow5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#10B981;dashed=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="650" y="580" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="595" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-bg" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E7EB;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="870" y="240" width="380" height="520" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-title" value="Failure Mode 3: Multi-Hop" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#FEE2E2;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=13;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#991B1B;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="890" y="255" width="340" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-step1" value="Step 1: Query requires comparing Data Source A with Data Source B" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="300" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-step2" value="Step 2: Vector search returns top K results, all from Document A" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E0F2FE;strokeColor=#0EA5E9;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="360" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-step3" value="Step 3: Document B ranked below threshold, not retrieved in top K" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="420" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-step4" value="Step 4: Answer generated with only partial information from Source A" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF3C7;strokeColor=#F59E0B;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="480" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-step5" value="Step 5: FAILURE - Information gap, comparison impossible without both sources" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEE2E2;strokeColor=#EF4444;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="540" width="320" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-solution" value="Solution: Iterative RAG or Graph RAG for multi-document synthesis" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D1FAE5;strokeColor=#10B981;fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#065F46;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="600" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-arrow1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1060" y="345" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1060" y="360" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-arrow2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1060" y="405" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1060" y="420" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-arrow3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#6B7280;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1060" y="465" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1060" y="480" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-arrow4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#EF4444;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1060" y="525" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1060" y="540" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sub3-arrow5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#10B981;dashed=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1060" y="585" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1060" y="600" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#111827, #d4dae7); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
